panels.content:
# Mobile Security Metrics

This dashboard shows Self-Defence Security Check results per platform. Select the platform and application using the dropdowns above.
panels.title: Introduction

targets.rawSql:
SELECT now() as time, sum(passed)/sum(total) * 100 as perc_passed from (
  SELECT (select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 1 else 0 end)
  from jsonb_array_elements(s.data->'security') as sec) as passed,
  jsonb_array_length(s.data->'security') as total
  FROM mobileAppMetrics as s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT a.clientId
    FROM mobileAppMetrics as a
    WHERE a.data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
    AND a.data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
  ) as apps ON (s.clientId = apps.clientId)
  group by s.data, s.event_time
  HAVING $__timeFilter(s.event_time)
) as totals

SELECT now() as time, sum(check_count) as value
FROM (
    SELECT jsonb_array_length(s.data->'security') as check_count
    FROM mobileAppMetrics as s
    INNER JOIN (
      SELECT DISTINCT a.clientId
      FROM mobileAppMetrics as a
      WHERE a.data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
      AND a.data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
    ) as apps ON (s.clientId = apps.clientId)
    group by s.data, s.event_time
    HAVING $__timeFilter(s.event_time)
  ) AS check_totals

select now() as time, sum(passed) as passed, sum(not_passed) as not_passed
from (SELECT event_time as time,
  (select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 1 else 0 end)
  from jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec) as passed,
  (select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 0 else 1 end)
  from jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec) as not_passed
FROM mobileAppMetrics) as t
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

select now() as time, platform as metric, sum(case when passed then 1 else 0 end) as passed
from (
  select s.clientId, platform, passed from 
  (
    select * from (
      select clientId, jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec
      FROM mobileAppMetrics
      where $__timeFilter(event_time)
    ) as securityRecords,
    jsonb_to_record(sec) as x(name text, passed boolean)
  ) AS s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT clientId, data->'device'->>'platform' as platform
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
) as t
group by metric

select now() as time, platform || ' not passed' as metric, sum(case when passed then 0 else 1 end) as passed
from (
  select s.clientId, platform, passed from 
  (
    select * from (
      select clientId, jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec
      FROM mobileAppMetrics
      where $__timeFilter(event_time)
    ) as securityRecords,
    jsonb_to_record(sec) as x(name text, passed boolean)
  ) AS s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT clientId, data->'device'->>'platform' as platform
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
) as t
group by metric

select client, appId as app, appVersion as "version", sdkVersion, platformVersion, sum(not_passed) as failed_checks from
(
  select s.clientId as client,
  (
    select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 0 else 1 end)
      from jsonb_array_elements(s.data->'security') as sec
  ) as not_passed,
  a.*
  from mobileAppMetrics AS s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (clientId)
    clientId,
    data->'app'->>'appId' as appId,
    data->'app'->>'appVersion' as appVersion,
    data->'app'->>'sdkVersion' as sdkVersion,
    data->'device'->>'platform' as platform,
    data->'device'->>'platformVersion' as platformVersion
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
    and data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
  WHERE $__timeFilter(s.event_time)
) as t
group by client, appId, appVersion, sdkVersion, platformVersion
ORDER BY sum(not_passed) DESC
LIMIT 10

select now() as time, name as metric, sum(case when passed then 1 else 0 end) as passed
from (
  select s.clientId, name, passed from 
  (
    select * from (
      select clientId, jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec
      FROM mobileAppMetrics
      where $__timeFilter(event_time)
    ) as securityRecords,
    jsonb_to_record(sec) as x(name text, passed boolean)
  ) AS s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT clientId
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
    and data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
) as t
group by metric

select now() as time, name || ' not passed' as metric, sum(case when passed then 0 else 1 end) as passed
from (
  select s.clientId, name, passed from 
  (
    select * from (
      select clientId, jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec
      FROM mobileAppMetrics
      where $__timeFilter(event_time)
    ) as securityRecords,
    jsonb_to_record(sec) as x(name text, passed boolean)
  ) AS s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT clientId
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
    and data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
) as t
group by metric

select event_time as time, sum(passed) as passed, sum(not_passed) as not_passed
from (
  SELECT event_time,
  (select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 1 else 0 end)
  from jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec) as passed,
  (select sum(case when (sec->>'passed')::boolean then 0 else 1 end)
  from jsonb_array_elements(data->'security') as sec) as not_passed
  FROM mobileAppMetrics as s
  INNER JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT clientId
    FROM mobileAppMetrics
    where data->'app'->>'appId' like $appId
    and data->'device'->>'platform' like $platform
  ) as a ON (s.clientId = a.clientId)
  where $__timeFilter(event_time)
) as check_counts
group by event_time
